name: Windy Egg's journey
description:
Personal submission for Egg Jam 3 (2020/09/15) hosted by the windybeardgames twitch channel. Follow the adventure of Windy Egg in his journey to regain his indie gamedev mojo. The humor and references might require knowledge of the windybeardgames channel and chat. 

Follow https://www.twitch.tv/windybeardgames for the next jams and more eggy shenanigans.

Also check out the other submissions here : https://windybeard-games.fandom.com/wiki/EggJam
